module.name: vCluster
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: The module creates clusters of events assuming a Gaussian distribution. Tracks clusters as they move.

param.desc: Specifies the stem name of ports created by the module.
Specifies how quickly cluster shape changes given new events.
Specifies how quickly cluster position changes given new events.
Threshold for a cluster to become active.
Threshold for a cluster to become inactive.
Threshold for a cluster to become free.
Maximum period at which a cluster can output a cluster event.
Initial cluster size on the x-axis.
Initial cluster size on the y-axis.
Initial angle between x and y-axes.
Specifies the maximum distance an event can be from the centre of the cluster.
Specifies a limit on the number of clusters.

input.description: Accepts the address events in the vBottle container

output.description: Outputs cluster events in the form of an eventdriven::GaussianAE. The vBottle also contains all events in the vBottle received as input.
